name: "Saury-Saury Scout"
description: A doll modeled after an Iktomisaurus Chick, built around the Scouting Buddy core mechanism from Sumeru. It can help scout out monsters and survey terrain, an adorable and dependable adventurer's friend.\nFront-Line Land Surveyor Mika, drawing on both his expertise and adventurers' needs, fully redesigned the Saury-Saury Scout to improve its mapping precision and agility. He also picked Iktomisaurus Chick as its form to embody its keen awareness to the around environment. After all, in a world full of danger, a sharp and clever companion is one you can always rely on.
